inShort: You will soon be contacted by one of our art coordinators.
asMonthlyArtist: As artist of the month, your works are listed for more eyes.
getOutMore: Get more out of your art
artCoordinator: Get access to an art advisor
priceWork: Help to set price on your art
offerText: Are you looking for the perfect frame for your artwork? As an appreciation of our collaboration with Min Ram, we are pleased to offer all our members an exclusive 25% discount on all orders on
onCheckout: at checkout to take advantage of this fantastic offer!
buyingArtTitle: This is how you buy an artwork from the artist
buyingArtBody: As a buyer of art at Artportable, you send a request directly to the artist. Click on an artwork and select the button ''Purchase request'' and write your message.
buyingArtBodyTwo: The artist usually responds within 1-3 days. After a communication is established, it is up to the artist and the buyer to settle the deal as well as any shipping costs or collection of the work. You can of course also ask more about the artist in the same request. But please only send questions about the art! Violations will be reported.
upgradePremiumStory: Upgrade to premium to be able to upload stories
fillInCountry: Please fill in Country and City
clickToEditIntro: Click here to write a short introduction

preferences.colorTooltip: The color you choose will appear as the header background at the top of your art portfolio, giving it a personal touch.

upgradeToShowArtworksDescription: Upgrade your plan to showcase your artworks in your profile and start selling your art.
